```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r plot}
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Air Quality"
  
# Create some sample data
set.seed(123)  # for reproducibility
data <- data.frame(
  x = rnorm(50),
  y = rnorm(50)
)

# Create basic scatter plot
plot <- ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue", size = 3) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Sample Scatter Plot",
    x = "X Axis",
    y = "Y Axis"
  )

# Display the plot
print(plot)
```
